title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
SR:
1. Open a file and make changes without saving it.
2. Open the JAR packager for the project of the unsaved file.
3. Fill in all the required fields such as path, destination, and name of the JAR packager description.
4. Press finish and observe the error message.
